name: Unity
body:
### Unity

[Unity] is very good (and small) unit test framework developed by [ThrowTheSwitch.org].
Together with another one tool from [ThrowTheSwitch.org] i.e. [CMock] any unit tests can be developed with minimal effort.

### CMake

Unfortunately, by default, [Unity] is not integrated with [CMake]. Additionally some additional effort is needed to:

 - generate _runner_ based on test definition,
 - run unit tests and generate test results,
 - summarize all test cases. 

Most of the work can be automated and [here](https://github.com/filug/Unity) [CMake] module (with full [Unity] project) is available.

#### Usage

To add support for [Unity] tests please include [unity.cmake] file like presented below

    include(3rdParty/Unity/cmake/unity.cmake)

After that each particular [Unity] test can be added by the following command

    unity_add_test(name src1 [src2...])

> **Note:** It is important to notice that for the first source file (_src1_ here) test runner will be generated.

If needed [Unity] test can be linked with any static library by the following command

    unity_link_libraries(name lib1 [lib2...])

All [Unity] tests are executed when `utest` target is invoked.

#### How it works

Each time when `unity_add_test` is called the first file is processed by [generate_test_runner.rb] and customized _test runner_ is generated.

In the next step all sources files (from `unity_add_test` call + generated _test runner_) and libraries (added via `unity_link_libraries` command) are used to produce binary test application.

Finally test application is executed and output is stored in `*.testresults` file.

---- 
When all [Unity] tests were executed [unity_test_summary.rb] is used to produce [Unity] test summary.

#### Example

    $ make utest
    [ 15%] Built target foomock
    [ 23%] Built target cexception
    [ 30%] Built target unity
    [ 53%] Built target utest.foo-test-STATIC
    [ 61%] Built target utest.foo-test-STATIC.executor
    [ 84%] Built target utest.playground
    [ 92%] Built target utest.playground.executor
    [100%] Show Unity tests summary
    
    --------------------------
    OVERALL UNITY TEST SUMMARY
    --------------------------
    2 TOTAL TESTS 0 TOTAL FAILURES 0 IGNORED
    
    [100%] Built target utest


[Unity]: http://www.throwtheswitch.org/unity 
[ThrowTheSwitch.org]: http://www.throwtheswitch.org
[CMock]: http://www.throwtheswitch.org/cmock
[CMake]: https://cmake.org
[unity.cmake]: https://github.com/filug/Unity/blob/master/cmake/unity.cmake
[generate_test_runner.rb]: https://github.com/filug/Unity/blob/master/auto/generate_test_runner.rb
[unity_test_summary.rb]: https://github.com/filug/Unity/blob/master/auto/unity_test_summary.rb
